BatchJobDefinition.name: BatchJobDefinition
BatchJobDefinition.description: Represents the definition of a batch job.

Description.description: The description of the batch job definition.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the batch job.

Language.description: The language in which the batch job is created.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the batch job.

ProcessGroup.description: The group or team that's using the batch job. This field is only applicable to Batch Management jobs.

Status.description: The status of the batch job.
